text: ومن ءايته الجوار فى البحر كالاعلم

translations.translation: Ships sailing in the ocean like ensigns are a sign of His.
And of His Signs are the ships that sail in the sea like mountains.
Further evidence (of His existence) are the ships which stand as mountains in the sea.
And among His signs are the ships sailing on the sea, like hills.
And among His signs are the ships in the sea like mountains.
And among His signs are the ships in the sea like mountains.
And of His signs are the ships that run on the sea like landmarks;
And of His portents are the ships, like banners on the sea;
Among His signs are the ships sailing like mountains on the sea:
And of His signs are the ships in the sea like landmarks.
Among His signs are the ships [that run] on the sea [appearing] like landmarks.
And among His Signs are the ships, smooth-running through the ocean, (tall) as mountains.
And among His Signs are the ships, in the sea, like mountains.
And among His signs are the ships that run on the sea like mountains and
And of His signs are the ships sailing the sea like flags.
And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.
[42:32] And of His signs are the ships [that run] on the sea [appearing] like landmarks, like mountains, in terms of their magnitude.
(And of His portents) and of the signs of His divine Oneness and power (are the ships, like banners) like hills (on the sea;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَمِنْ آيَاتِهِ ٱلْجَوَارِ فِي ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلأَعْلاَمِ } فالجَواري: السفنُ
 واحدُها: جاريةٌ
 والأَعلامُ: الجِبالُ
 واحدُها عَلَمٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } أيضاً { مِنْ آيَاتِهِ } الدالة على ولايته الكاملة، وتدبيراته الشاملة { ٱلْجَوَارِ } أي: السفن الجارية { فِي ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلأَعْلاَمِ } [الشورى: 32] أي: كالجبال الرواسي في العظمة والثقل

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { ومن آياته } للدلالة على قدرته ووحدانيته { الجواري } السفن الجارية { في البحر كالأعلام } كالجبال { إِن يشاء يسكن الرياح } التي تجريها
 وقرىء بالإفراد
